text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: What did you think, Trainer?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Did I succeed in leading by example?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Then I am satisfied.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Almost a year has passed since I started<n>my senior
year.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
If my performance has managed to<n>inspire
younger racers, I can't think of<n>anything more
worthwhile.
choice_data_list: You're not planning to stop now, are you?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Hahaha! Don't worry, there's no chance<n>of that.
Can't you see the fire in my<n>eyes?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Naturally, I'm already looking to the<n>future. My
next challenge will be...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Precisely.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
But this will be no repeat of last year. I<n>intend to
show the world the fruits of my<n>labors.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
Symboli Rudolf looks fired up enough<n>already,
but I have one more thing to<n>tell her.
choice_data_list: I hear Maruzensky's going to be there.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Maruzensky. I see...

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text: On the way back...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Oh, is that...

text_block_list.name: Student Council General Manager
text_block_list.text:
...And that concludes our tour of the<n>academy.
Do you have any questions?

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
Yes, the student council's general<n>manager. It
looks like she's leading a<n>group of Umamusume
around.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Now that I think about it, today was the<n>day that
the new student council<n>members were supposed
to be given a<n>guided tour.

text_block_list.name: Short Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
You know... I'm starting to think that<n>maybe the
student council might not be<n>right for me...

text_block_list.name: Student Council General Manager
text_block_list.text: Why do you say that?

text_block_list.name: Short Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
I joined because of the President, but<n>when I saw
her race today...

text_block_list.name: Short Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
She was so much better than I could ever<n>hope to
be. I feel like there's no point...

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
Symboli Rudolf says nothing. She's<n>waiting to see
how the general manager<n>will respond.

text_block_list.name: Student Council General Manager
text_block_list.text:
I know what you mean. I felt exactly the<n>same way
when I first joined.

text_block_list.name: Short Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Really?

text_block_list.name: Student Council General Manager
text_block_list.text:
I thought there was no way I could ever<n>live up to
my station, and it made me<n>feel really down on
myself.

text_block_list.name: Student Council General Manager
text_block_list.text:
Honestly, I still feel useless most of the<n>time. But I
can tell you one thing for<n>certain: I've grown a lot
as a person<n>since I began.

text_block_list.name: Student Council General Manager
text_block_list.text:
So if you want to improve yourself...<n>would you
consider hanging in a little<n>longer?

text_block_list.name: Short Umamusume
text_block_list.text: A-all right... I'll give it a shot!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Heh.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
It's gratifying to see the younger<n>students
maturing off the track as well as<n>on it.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
And it's a relief to know that the<n>academy will be
in safe hands even after<n>I'm gone.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
Symboli Rudolf looks like a weight has<n>been lifted
from her shoulders. This is<n>the perfect time to
spring my proposal!
choice_data_list:
There's something I've been meaning to ask
you.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: That's rather sudden, but by all means.
choice_data_list:
I want you to forget about your titles at the
Arima Kinen.

I want you to forget about your titles at the
Arima Kinen.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
I don't want her to race as the Emperor<n>or the
President, but simply as Symboli<n>Rudolf.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: I understand what you're trying to say.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
But my pride as the Emperor won't allow<n>it. The
weight of my responsibilities is<n>what makes me
who I am.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
What's the harm in setting all that aside<n>once in a
while?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Air Groove! I didn't see you there.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Indeed. I was assisting with the tour. But<n>more to
the point...

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: I concur with your trainer's suggestion.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Every time you race, you hold your real<n>self back
in order to be more true to<n>your ideals.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
But now your successors are well on their<n>way to
maturity. I think, just once, you<n>should race the
way you truly want to.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: I have raced the way I wanted to. This isthe path I chose when I became theEmperor.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Good grief. Why must you insist on<n>being so
hardheaded?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: How about this, then? Do it for us.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: For you?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
I've always wanted to see how you would<n>race if
you let your heart guide you.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
If you let yourself be nothing more than<n>an
Umamusume seeking a challenge.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
I believe I speak for the entire student<n>council
when I say we would relish the<n>learning
experience.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
So, in your capacity as president... would<n>you
show us what it looks like when you<n>race as
Symboli Rudolf?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Sigh... You know exactly how to pull mystrings, don't you?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: I've been at this for a while now, you<n>know.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Very well. You win. If both my trainer<n>and my own
right hand turn against me,<n>what am I to do?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
When I race in the Arima Kinen, I will let<n>the titles
of Emperor and President fall<n>by the wayside.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: As for what will come of it, I cannot say.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Heh...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Me neither. It will be a learning<n>experience for
both of us.
